required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on October 07, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Prospective Assay for SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Antibody Detection Indirectly by Immunofluorescence: SARS-CoV2 IIF Method
clinical_study.official_title: Prospective Assay for SARS-CoV-2 Antibody Detection Indirectly by Immunofluorescence: SARS-CoV2 IIF Method

brief_summary.textblock: Prospective assay for SARS-CoV-2 antibody detection indirectly by immunofluorescence: SARS-CoV2 IIF method

detailed_description.textblock:
Sample preparation, serum separation by centrifugation
- 100 µl of serum for standard SARS-CoV2 ELISA is used according to the instructions for use.
- 100 µl of serum indirect immunofluorescent (IIF) method is used, the samples thus prepared analysis is performed under an automated microscope

primary_outcome.measure: Sensitivity of the method by SARS-CoV2 ELISA compared
primary_outcome.description: Sensitivity of the method by SARS-CoV2 ELISA compared

secondary_outcome.measure: Detectability of the antibodies IgA type against SARS-CoV2 virus
secondary_outcome.description: Detectability of the antibodies IgA type against SARS-CoV2 virus in the early stages of the disease.

arm_group.description: Subjects are diagnosed with SARS-CoV2 by qPCR assay.
Subject were 2 times proved negative SARS-CoV2 by qPCR assay.

intervention.description: Serum indirect immunofluorescent (IIF) method is used, analysis is performed under an automated microscope.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Person over 18 years of age
- Signing a package leaflet and a informal consent
- In the case of a positive group, confirmed by SARS-CoV2 qPCR Patient with COVID-19 or recovered individual.
- In case of negative group by SARS-CoV2 qPCR test 2 negative in COVID-19 suffering individual
Exclusion Criteria:
- Refuses to sign the consent form

overall_official.affiliation: University of Szeged, Institute of Clinical Microbilogy

facility.name: University of Szeged, Albert Szent-Györgyi Health Center

link.description: A serological assay to detect SARS-CoV-2 seroconversion in humans
Serological and molecular findings during SARS-CoV-2 infection: the first case study in Finland, January to February 2020
